title: Let's play safe
creator_credit: Portafilms, John Sullivan and William H Murray
brief_description: The playground adventures of the Wrong Donkey, the Giddy Goose, the Foolish Fish, the Pushy Pig, the Dumb Bunny, and the Mock Monkey: using animation and stop-action photography, this film shows children in an amusing and easily remembered way how to avoid various playground accidents.
